# erx-diff-viewer



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute           | Description                 | Type                   | Default      |
| ----------------- | ------------------- | --------------------------- | ---------------------- | ------------ |
| `mode`            | `mode`              | View mode: split or unified | `"split" \| "unified"` | `'split'`    |
| `newText`         | `new-text`          | New/modified text           | `string`               | `''`         |
| `newTitle`        | `new-title`         | New file name               | `string`               | `'Modified'` |
| `oldText`         | `old-text`          | Old/original text           | `string`               | `''`         |
| `oldTitle`        | `old-title`         | Old file name               | `string`               | `'Original'` |
| `showHeaders`     | `show-headers`      | Show file headers           | `boolean`              | `true`       |
| `showLineNumbers` | `show-line-numbers` | Show line numbers           | `boolean`              | `true`       |
| `wordWrap`        | `word-wrap`         | Wrap long lines             | `boolean`              | `false`      |
